snippet: The Syrian state news media reported Tuesday that the country’s air defense systems had shot down an American surveillance plane near the northwestern city of Latakia.
abstract: Syrian state news reports an American surveillance plane was shot down near Latakia by country's air defense and televises loading of plane pieces by soldiers; American defense officials confirm losing contact with MQ-1 Predator and are investigating what would be first downing of US aircraft in Syria since fight against ISIS began in 2014.
lead_paragraph: The Syrian state news media reported Tuesday that the country’s air defense systems had shot down an American surveillance plane near the northwestern city of Latakia.

headline.main: Syria: Reports Claim Downing of a U.S. Surveillance Drone
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Syria: Reports Claim Downing of a U.S. Surveillance Drone

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
